description: black velvet strips pulled over a heavy doughnut form to create crown; beaded strap with bright multicolored yarns at front of hat; PL end of strip has beaded strands with pearly white beads; opposite end of strap has multicolored (predominately orange and maroon) synthetic knitted strands, woven through beaded bands on crown; long back synthetic strands in same colors as on strip, with brightly-colored beads and pompons at top
dimension: 3 1/2 x 11 1/8 x 11 in. (8.89 x 28.26 x 27.94 cm) (without back fringe)
medium: Velvet, beads, wool , synthetic fibers, sequins
title: Hat
